author: Ludovico De Biaggi
description: Making the above recipe we found ourselves pondering why the 5ml of sugar syrup was not incorporated in to the banana paste. The finished drink is basically a banana and maraschino influenced aged rum daiquiri.
name: Tropical Lady
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
<strong>*Special ingredient #1<strong>: Banana paste made by blending 3 bananas with 350ml simple syrup and straining into a clean bottle
Will keep for 2 days in the fridge
